generate.description: Generate the architecture dependency graph and save it

visualize.description: Generate visual representations of the architecture graph

validate-no-architecture-cycles.description: Validate the architecture graph has no circular project dependencies

validate-architecture-unchanged.description: Validate the architecture graph matches the saved blessed graph

validate-no-skiplevel-deps.description: Validate no project has redundant transitive dependencies

validate-packagejson.description: Validate package.json dependencies match project.json build dependencies

validate-new-methods.description: Validate new methods don't exceed max line count (only runs in affected mode)

validate-modified-methods.description: Validate modified methods don't exceed max line count (encourages gradual cleanup)

help.description: Display help for @webpieces/dev-config commands and targets

validate-eslint-sync.description: Validate that workspace and template eslint.webpieces.config.mjs files have identical rules

validate-versions-locked.description: Validate package.json versions are locked (no semver ranges) and npm ci compatible

validate-modified-files.description: Validate modified files don't exceed max line count

validate-code.description: Combined validation for new methods, modified methods, and file sizes

validate-return-types.description: Validate methods have explicit return type annotations

validate-no-inline-types.description: Validate no inline type literals are used - prefer named types

validate-no-any-unknown.description: Validate no any/unknown keywords are used - use specific types instead
